endpoints.description: Run a single prediction on the model

parameters.name: width

param_schema.title: Width
param_schema.description: Width of the generated image. The model was really only trained on 512x512 images. Other sizes tend to create less coherent images.

parameters.description: Width of the generated image. The model was really only trained on 512x512 images. Other sizes tend to create less coherent images.

parameters.name: height

param_schema.title: Height
param_schema.description: Height of the generated image. The model was really only trained on 512x512 images. Other sizes tend to create less coherent images.

parameters.description: Height of the generated image. The model was really only trained on 512x512 images. Other sizes tend to create less coherent images.

parameters.name: prompts
parameters.default:
a moth
a killer dragonfly
Two fishes talking to eachother in deep sea

param_schema.title: Prompts
param_schema.default:
a moth
a killer dragonfly
Two fishes talking to eachother in deep sea

parameters.name: batch_size

param_schema.title: Batch Size
param_schema.description: Number of images to generate at once. Higher batch sizes will generate images faster but will use more GPU memory i.e. not work depending on resolution.

parameters.description: Number of images to generate at once. Higher batch sizes will generate images faster but will use more GPU memory i.e. not work depending on resolution.

parameters.name: frame_rate

param_schema.title: Frame Rate
param_schema.description: Frames per second for the generated video.

parameters.description: Frames per second for the generated video.

parameters.name: random_seed

param_schema.title: Random Seed
param_schema.description: Each seed generates a different image

parameters.description: Each seed generates a different image

parameters.name: prompt_scale

param_schema.title: Prompt Scale
param_schema.description: Determines influence of your prompt on generation.

parameters.description: Determines influence of your prompt on generation.

parameters.name: style_suffix
parameters.default: Painting by Paul Klee, intricate details

param_schema.title: Style Suffix
param_schema.default: Painting by Paul Klee, intricate details
param_schema.description: Style suffix to add to the prompt. This can be used to add the same style to each prompt.

parameters.description: Style suffix to add to the prompt. This can be used to add the same style to each prompt.

parameters.name: diffusion_steps

param_schema.title: Diffusion Steps
param_schema.description: Number of diffusion steps. Higher steps could produce better results but will take longer to generate. Maximum 30 (using K-Euler-Diffusion).

parameters.description: Number of diffusion steps. Higher steps could produce better results but will take longer to generate. Maximum 30 (using K-Euler-Diffusion).

parameters.name: audio_noise_scale

param_schema.title: Audio Noise Scale
param_schema.description: Larger values mean audio will lead to bigger changes in the image.

parameters.description: Larger values mean audio will lead to bigger changes in the image.

parameters.name: audio_loudness_type

param_schema.description: Type of loudness to use for audio. Options are 'rms' or 'peak'.

parameters.description: Type of loudness to use for audio. Options are 'rms' or 'peak'.

parameters.name: frame_interpolation

param_schema.title: Frame Interpolation
param_schema.description: Whether to interpolate between frames using FFMPEG or not.

parameters.description: Whether to interpolate between frames using FFMPEG or not.

width.title: Width
width.description: Width of the generated image. The model was really only trained on 512x512 images. Other sizes tend to create less coherent images.

height.title: Height
height.description: Height of the generated image. The model was really only trained on 512x512 images. Other sizes tend to create less coherent images.

prompts.title: Prompts
prompts.default:
a moth
a killer dragonfly
Two fishes talking to eachother in deep sea

batch_size.title: Batch Size
batch_size.description: Number of images to generate at once. Higher batch sizes will generate images faster but will use more GPU memory i.e. not work depending on resolution.

frame_rate.title: Frame Rate
frame_rate.description: Frames per second for the generated video.

random_seed.title: Random Seed
random_seed.description: Each seed generates a different image

prompt_scale.title: Prompt Scale
prompt_scale.description: Determines influence of your prompt on generation.

style_suffix.title: Style Suffix
style_suffix.default: Painting by Paul Klee, intricate details
style_suffix.description: Style suffix to add to the prompt. This can be used to add the same style to each prompt.

diffusion_steps.title: Diffusion Steps
diffusion_steps.description: Number of diffusion steps. Higher steps could produce better results but will take longer to generate. Maximum 30 (using K-Euler-Diffusion).

audio_noise_scale.title: Audio Noise Scale
audio_noise_scale.description: Larger values mean audio will lead to bigger changes in the image.

audio_loudness_type.description: Type of loudness to use for audio. Options are 'rms' or 'peak'.

frame_interpolation.title: Frame Interpolation
frame_interpolation.description: Whether to interpolate between frames using FFMPEG or not.
